title: BlackRockâ€™s Bitcoin ETF achieves legendary status after hitting second-largest inflows for 2024
description:
Quick Take VettaFI’s data showcases the impressive traction of BlackRock’s IBIT, marking it as the US ETF with the second-largest inflows year to date. IBIT only trails behind the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF, which has garnered inflows of $21.6 billion year-to-date (YTD), positioning it at the forefront. Notably, despite IBIT’s trading activity spanning merely 50 […]

The post BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF achieves legendary status after hitting second-largest inflows for 2024 appeared first on CryptoSlate.
